extendedInfo.description: Stay up to date with cutting edge computer hardware, modding and games coverage from bit-tech. Bit-tech is committed to bringing its readers accurate hardware testing and insightful analysis as well as covering custom PC modification, the best in gaming and daily IT industry news.Now you can access all this great content and more in a great new format optimised especially for Android phones. Even better, the app includes fully optimised mobile access to the renowned bit-tech forums and the bit-tech podcast.

reviews.comment: Great little app if you want to follow bit-tech on the move.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Easy to use and provides all the info in one place.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stopped working about a month ago
reviews.author: Michael Clason

reviews.title: dont waste ur money, this offers nothing in value
reviews.comment: like the title says, this offers nothing that your built in web browser cant access on their site. When this is free then it will be worth something but right now its a glorified web links.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its OK for what it does, many better free options, but its good to support Bit-Tech
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Well designed app. Runs nice and smooth on my Galaxy S2. One issue is that there is no way to get rid of the subscribe icon despite being a subscriber
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Use Tapatalk
reviews.comment: Just use Tapatalk, \302\2431.79 for this? I installed and had a play, nothing special and certainly not worth the price!
reviews.author: A Google User
